term.stringConstant: please choose one of the following options:
Thanks for playing RushHour. For comments, questions and suggestions:
In RushHour, there is a car stuck in a
traffic jam. The goal of the game is to rearrange the cars/trucks
in such a manner that will enable this specific car (you'll
know which car when you see it) to exit the board. The exit of
the board is located above the middle to the right and is
marked with a line of double width.
to move a car/truck, move the cursor to one of its edges. This
will cause a small arrow to appear in a certain direction.
If you now hit SPACE, the car/truck will move in that direction.
If a car started out vertically oriented on the board, it can only move
vertically, and if it started horizontally it will be able to move only
please choose a board between 1 and 12 :
More great products soon to come from:GRASS
Golan and Rosenfeld Affordable Software Solutions
